document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Boheman, C. H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Boheman, C. H. (1843) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal, C. H. Boheman, et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 7 (2). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 461 pp.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Asia Minor , North Africa ( Caldara 2013a ).

Material examined.

: 2 spec. ( ZIN ) Novoselivka , Svyatohirsk Monastery Arnoldi leg.,
28.v.1937
;

: 1 spec. ( SIZK )

Salix
sp., V . Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
1.viii.2002
;

Vinnytsia Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Verkhivka , N48.449871 , E29.144449 , A. Chekini leg.,

1 spec. ( ZIN ) Uzhhorod , Nevytske , A.L. Lobanov leg.,

Biology. Forest edge, shrublands. Adults occur in III–X. On Salicaceae :
Salix caprea
,
S. cinerea
,
S. triandra
,
S. viminalis
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1972 ; Dieckmann 1986 );
S. alba
,
S. purpurea
( Smreczyński 1972 ; Dieckmann 1986 );
S. aurita
,
S. fragilis ( Dieckmann 1986 )
.
